verses.verse: And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> even for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
And they <S%H1961>had<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> or <S%H7652>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%>
And <S%H2705>Hazarshual,<s%> and <S%H1088>Balah,<s%> and <S%H6107>Azem,<s%>
And <S%H513>Eltolad,<s%> and <S%H1329>Bethul,<s%> and <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%>
And <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> and <S%H1024>Beth-marcaboth,<s%> and <S%H2701>Hazar-susah,<s%>
And <S%H1034>Beth-lebaoth,<s%> and <S%H8287>Sharuhen;<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Ain, <S%H5871><s%> <S%H7417>Remmon,<s%> and <S%H6281>Ether,<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their villages: <S%H2691><s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1192>Baalath-beer,<s%> <S%H7418>Ramath<s%> of the <S%H5045>south.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Out of the <S%H4480>portion<s%> <S%H2256><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2506>part<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> too <S%H7227>much<s%> for <S%H4480>them:<s%> therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> had their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of them.

And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> Sarid: <S%H8301><s%>

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H4831>Maralah,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H1708>Dabbasheth,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam;<s%>

And <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H4480>Sarid<s%> <S%H8301><s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> <S%H8121><s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3696>Chisloth-tabor,<s%> and then goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1705>Daberath,<s%> and goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3309>Japhia,<s%>

And from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> passeth on <S%H5674>along<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> to <S%H1662>Gittah-hepher,<s%> to <S%H6278>Ittah-kazin,<s%> and goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7417>Remmon-methoar<s%> to <S%H5269>Neah;<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> it on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> to <S%H2615>Hannathon:<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> thereof <S%H1961>are<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Jipthah-el: <S%H3317><s%>

And <S%H7005>Kattath,<s%> and <S%H5096>Nahallal,<s%> and <S%H8110>Shimron,<s%> and <S%H3030>Idalah,<s%> and <S%H1035>Bethlehem:<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> toward <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and <S%H3694>Chesulloth,<s%> and <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%>
And <S%H2663>Hapharaim,<s%> and <S%H7866>Shion,<s%> and <S%H588>Anaharath,<s%>
And <S%H7245>Rabbith,<s%> and <S%H7191>Kishion,<s%> and <S%H77>Abez,<s%>
And <S%H7432>Remeth,<s%> and <S%H5873>En-gannim,<s%> and <S%H5876>En-haddah,<s%> and <S%H1048>Beth-pazzez;<s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H7831>Shahazimah,<s%> and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh;<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> at <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
And the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H2520>Helkath,<s%> and <S%H2482>Hali,<s%> and <S%H991>Beten,<s%> and <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>
And <S%H487>Alammelech,<s%> and <S%H6008>Amad,<s%> and <S%H4861>Misheal;<s%> and <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and to <S%H7884>Shihor-libnath;<s%>

And <S%H7725>turneth<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> <S%H8121><s%> to <S%H1016>Beth-dagon,<s%> and <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Jipthah-el<s%> toward the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H1025>Beth-emek,<s%> and <S%H5272>Neiel,<s%> and goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> on the left <S%H8040>hand,<s%>
And <S%H5683>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> and <S%H2540>Hammon,<s%> and <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Zidon;<s%>

And then the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%> and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> to <S%H2621>Hosah;<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> thereof <S%H1961>are<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea<s%> from the <S%H4480>coast<s%> <S%H2256><s%> to Achzib: <S%H392><s%>
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> also, and <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> even for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> from <S%H4480>Heleph,<s%> <S%H2501><s%> from <S%H4480>Allon<s%> <S%H436><s%> to <S%H6815>Zaanannim,<s%> and <S%H129>Adami,<s%> <S%H5346>Nekeb,<s%> and <S%H2995>Jabneel,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H3946>Lakum;<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> at Jordan: <S%H3383><s%>

And then the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to <S%H243>Aznoth-tabor,<s%> and goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> to <S%H2712>Hukkok,<s%> and <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> on the south <S%H5045>side,<s%> and <S%H6293>reacheth<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the west <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> upon <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>
And the <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6661>Ziddim,<s%> <S%H6863>Zer,<s%> and <S%H2575>Hammath,<s%> <S%H7557>Rakkath,<s%> and <S%H3672>Chinnereth,<s%>
And <S%H128>Adamah,<s%> and <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%>
And <S%H6943>Kedesh,<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> and <S%H5877>En-hazor,<s%>

And <S%H3375>Iron,<s%> and <S%H4027>Migdal-el,<s%> <S%H2765>Horem,<s%> and <S%H1043>Beth-anath,<s%> and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh;<s%> <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
And the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> and <S%H5905>Ir-shemesh,<s%>
And <S%H8169>Shaalabbin,<s%> and <S%H357>Ajalon,<s%> and <S%H3494>Jethlah,<s%>
And <S%H356>Elon,<s%> and <S%H8553>Thimnathah,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%>
And <S%H514>Eltekeh,<s%> and <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> and <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%>
And <S%H3055>Jehud,<s%> and <S%H1139>Bene-berak,<s%> and <S%H1667>Gath-rimmon,<s%>
And <S%H4313>Me-jarkon,<s%> and <S%H7542>Rakkon,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H4136>before<s%> <S%H3305>Japho.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> too little for <S%H4480>them:<s%> therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3959>Leshem,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein, and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3959>Leshem,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

When they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of dividing the land for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H776><s%> by their <S%H1367>coasts,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them:

According <S%H5921><s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7592>asked,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H8556>Timnathserah<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein.

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H5159>inheritances,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> divided for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%> So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4480>dividing<s%> <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>
